title: Pixel 4 and Nest Hub (1)
content: I have a Next Hub next to my desk and a Pixel 4, which is usually with me wherever. Whenever I 'Ok Google' to request something from the Next my Pixel also activates and copies the action if it can or fails if it's not possible. As far as I understand it this shouldn't happen, but I can't figure out how to get the phone to stop. Any help appreciated.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
